title: Problem with USB C Socket and now it stucks and can't open the phone !!
content:
I got the Google Pixel 3 XL in Jan and now after 3 months of usage I started to have weird problems :
1) The USB C socket is not working all the time .. sometimes I have to unplug and plug whatever the device (charger, headphones, ..) several times to start reading it.

2) And now I can't even open the phone, the battery was dead and I started to charge it and it just keep showing google logo without even pressing the power button .. and it stuck there I can't open the phone and I can't even close it.

I don't know what to do ?! I'm very frustrated
